org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.receive
Interface IAeExtendedMessageContext

All Superinterfaces:
IAeMessageContext, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeExtendedMessageContext
public interface IAeExtendedMessageContext
extends IAeMessageContext

Extended Message Context interface supporting the additional information required by our pluggable receive handlers such as those for SOAP messages, including WSRM
